name: Everyday Volunteer
description:
Nordic Game Jam 2020 Submission.

We have a special volunteer service in Russia. They deliver groceries and other things to older people who find it dangerous to go outside during the quarantine period. This game is about one of these heroes.

Each volunteer risks his health to help those in need. This is everyday magic, which we often do not notice.

How to:
Moving with arrow keys, escape to skip dialogue.

Credits:
Some sprites and sounds form itch.io.
